sectioninfo.titleabbrev: Presentation of FASB ASC Pending Content in AICPA Audit and Accounting Guides
sectioninfo.title: Presentation of FASB ASC Pending Content in AICPA Audit and Accounting Guides

root.para: Amended FASB ASC guidance that is included in pending content boxes in FASB ASC on September 1, 2020, is referenced as “Pending Content” in this guide. Readers should be aware that pending content referenced in this guide will eventually be subjected to FASB’s roll-off process and no longer be labeled as “Pending Content” in FASB ASC (as discussed in the previous paragraph).
